item.description:
Spiritual Freedom
Enjoy your life at the deepest level by freeing yourself from the demands of your ego - your thoughts, emotions, fears, body demands, addictions and self-absorption. You are more than your personality and individual needs. Live life from an expanded place with joy, letting go, ease and passion without attachment.

$20, sliding scale to $10

 

Herb Pearce has been leading spiritual development workshops for years.

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Spiritual Freedom
